description:
To celebrate another great year of data events, a few drinks seemed in order. We'll decide/update the specific pub nearer the time, but it will be one of the fine establishments on King Street in central Bristol (near the fountains and Queens Square).

All welcome, send me a message if you're not sure you'll be able to spot us, and we'll liaise to make sure you can find us :)

Also keep an eye out for details about a PyData talk and social on 19th December - we'll post a link to it on our meetup site when available...
title: Christmas drinks social
